oilmm.ilmm module¶

class oilmm.ilmm.ILMMPP(*args, **kw_args)[source]¶

Bases: object

Probabilistic programming implementation of the Instantaneous Linear Mixing Model.

Parameters

  • kernels (list[stheno.Kernel]) –

  • h (matrix) – Mixing matrix.

  • noise_obs (scalar) – Observation noise. One.

  • noises_latent (vector) – Latent noises.

condition(x, y)[source]¶

Condition on data.

Parameters

  • x (tensor) – Input locations.

  • y (tensor) – Observed values.

logpdf(x, y)[source]¶

Compute the logpdf of data.

Parameters

  • x (tensor) – Input locations.

  • y (tensor) – Observed values.

Returns

Logpdf of data.

Return type

tensor

predict(x, latent=False)[source]¶

Compute marginals.

Parameters

  • x (tensor) – Inputs to construct marginals at.

  • latent (bool, optional) – Predict noiseless processes. Defaults to False.

Returns

Tuple containing means, lower 95% central credible

bound, and upper 95% central credible bound.

Return type

tuple[matrix]

sample(x, latent=False)[source]¶

Sample data.

Parameters

  • x (tensor) – Inputs to sample at.

  • latent (bool, optional) – Sample noiseless processes. Defaults to False.
